DtScriptedTaskMetaData.myDescription: Set visual markings on vehicle. Only works if 3D visual model is configured for variable markings.

myVariables.item: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="4"> <myVariableName>platoon</myVariableName> <myType>combo</myType> <myLabel>Platoon</myLabel> <myToolTip></myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>None</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData>None;Scout;Mortar;Antitank;4th;5th;6th</myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> <myScriptedTaskVariableName></myScriptedTaskVariableName> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>
